Further details about how the [Service to Service functionality](/monetization/studio-as-purchase-server) works and can be used to operate your own purchase server is recommended reading prior to implementing this endpoint."

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get Transactions"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/s2s/monetization-teams/{monetization-team-id}/transactions"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get all monetization transactions for the given monetization team. Successful request will return a `200 - Success` response. Further details about how the [Service to Service functionality](/monetization/studio-as-purchase-server) works and can be used to operate your own purchase server is recommended reading prior to implementing this endpoint.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"monetization-team-id","in":"path","description":"Monetization Team ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":1}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/x-www-form-urlencoded":{"schema":{"properties":{"transaction_type":{"title":"Get Monetization Transaction Type Enum","description":"The transaction types to find transactions by. Can be used as an array or on its own.","type":"string","enum":["CANCELLED","CLEARED","CREDITED","FAILED","PAID","PENDING","REFUNDED"],"x-enumDescriptions":{"CANCELLED":"Payment cancelled by seller","CLEARED":"Payment taken and earned funds released","FAILED":"Payment failed to process","PAID":"Payment taken but funds not released","PENDING":"Pending transaction no payment taken","REFUNDED":"Payment refunded to buyer"}},"monetization_type":{"title":"Monetization Token Enum","description":"The monetization types to find transactions by.","type":"string","enum":["FIAT","TOKEN","EXTERNAL"],"x-enumDescriptions":{"FIAT":"payment made with real world currency","TOKEN":"a payment made with virtual currency","EXTERNAL":"a payment made with an external purchase service"}},"buyer":{"description":"The buyer id of who made the transaction to filter by. Can only be used as a single filter.","type":"integer"},"clawback_uuid":{"description":"The unique identifier submitted during the transaction that can be used to trace a clawback event.","type":"string"},"gateway_uuid":{"description":"The unique identifier created during the transaction that can be used to trace a transaction.","type":"string"},"line_items":{"description":"The line_item key value to filter by. Can only be used as a single filter. Filtering can be done by key value on the line item. i.e. mod_id:1 or buyer_id:1","type":"string"},"created_at_start":{"description":"Unix timestamp of date to start filtering transactions from. Assumes the end date to current if not given.","type":"integer"}},"type":"object"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful Request","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Get Transactions","properties":{"data":{"description":"Array containing transaction objects.","type":"array","items":{"title":"Transaction Object Index","properties":{"id":{"description":"Unique transaction id.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1234},"gateway_uuid":{"description":"The universally unique ID (UUID) that represents a unique tranasction with the payment gateway.","type":"string","example":"123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000"},"gateway_name":{"description":"The gateway that processed the transaction.","type":"string","example":"tilia"},"account_id":{"description":"The unique monetization account id that actioned the transaction.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":"12345"},"gross_amount":{"description":"The gross amount of the transaction.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":199},"net_amount":{"description":"The net amount of the transaction.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":199},"platform_fee":{"description":"The platform fee of the transaction.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":20},"gateway_fee":{"description":"The gateway fee of the transaction.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":30},"tax":{"description":"The tax amount of the transaction.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":0},"tax_type":{"description":"The tax type on the processed transaction.","type":"string","example":"sales"},"currency":{"description":"The currency type on the processed transaction.","type":"string","example":"usd"},"tokens":{"description":"The amount of virtual currency associated with the transaction. Will be omitted when no tokens are involved.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":0},"transaction_type":{"description":"The transaction status type on the processed transaction. I.e. is it paid, pending, refunded or cleared.","type":"string","example":"paid"},"monetization_type":{"description":"The monetizaton type on the processed transaction. I.e. is it fiat, tokens or external.","type":"string","example":"paid"},"purchase_date":{"description":"The beginging purchase date the transaction started on in a human reabled date time stamp.","type":"string","example":"2024-10-07 02:29:11"},"created_at":{"description":"The timestamp of date the transaction status was recorded in micro time precsion.","type":"string","example":"1728268151123456"},"payment_method":{"description":"Array containing payment method objects.","type":"array","items":{"title":"Payment Method Object","description":"Contains Payment Method data.","properties":{"name":{"description":"The pretty name of the payment method that was used.","type":"string","example":"Visa ending in 1111"},"id":{"description":"The UUID of the payment method id that was used.","type":"string","example":"123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000"},"amount":{"description":"The amount the payment method was charged.","type":"integer","example":199},"display_amount":{"description":"A pretty string of the amount the payment method was charged.","type":"string","example":"USD 1.99"}},"type":"object"}},"line_items":{"description":"Array containing line item objects.","type":"array","items":{"title":"Line Items Object","description":"Contains line item data.","properties":{"game_id":{"description":"The game id of the transaction.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":0},"buyer_id":{"description":"The buyer id of the transaction.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":0},"game_name":{"description":"The name of the game the purchase occured on.","type":"string","example":"my game"},"buyer_name":{"description":"The username of the buyer.","type":"string","example":"smith"},"token_name":{"description":"The pretty name of the virtual currency used in the transaction.","type":"string","example":"mio"},"token_pack_id":{"description":"The id of the virtual currency pack used in the transaction.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":0},"token_pack_name":{"description":"The pretty name of the virtual currency pack used in the transaction.","type":"string","example":"200 Pack"}},"type":"object"}}},"type":"object"}},"download":{"title":"Pagination Object","description":"Contains pagination data.","properties":{"per_page":{"description":"The number of items shown per page.","type":"integer","example":"15"},"current_page":{"description":"The url for the current page.","type":"string","example":"/v1/s2s/monetization-teams/{monetization-team-id}/transactions?cursor=eyJjcmVhdGVkX2F0IjoiMjAyNC0xMC0wMiAwMDo1NTozMiIsIl9wb2ludHNUb05leHRJdaAJdsa10"},"next_page_url":{"description":"The url for the next page if it exists.","type":"integer","example":"/v1/s2s/monetization-teams/{monetization-team-id}/transactions?cursor=eyJjcmVhdGVkX2F0IjoiMjAyNC0xMC0wMiAwMDo1NTozMiIsIl9wb2ludHNUb05leHRJdaAJdsa10"},"prev_page_url":{"description":"The url for the previous page if it exists.","type":"integer","example":"/v1/s2s/monetization-teams/{monetization-team-id}/transactions?cursor=eyJjcmVhdGVkX2F0IjoiMjAyNC0xMC0wMiAwMDo1NTozMiIsIl9wb2ludHNUb05leHRJdaAJdsa10"}},"type":"object"}},"type":"object"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
